SPIDER.queryLike: SELECT ftel.task AS Task, ftel.revision AS Revision, fcel.java_class_error AS JAVA_CLASS_ERROR FROM spider_bmd.full_task_error_list ftel JOIN spider_bmd.full_compiler_error_list fcel ON ftel.java_class_error_id = fcel.id WHERE ftel.task LIKE ? AND ftel.revision = ? AND fcel.java_class_error = ? ORDER BY Task, Revision, JAVA_CLASS_ERROR\n LIMIT ?";
SPIDER.queryAccurate: SELECT ftel.task AS Task, ftel.revision AS Revision, fcel.java_class_error AS JAVA_CLASS_ERROR FROM spider_bmd.full_task_error_list ftel JOIN spider_bmd.full_compiler_error_list fcel ON ftel.java_class_error_id = fcel.id WHERE ftel.task = ? AND ftel.revision = ? AND fcel.java_class_error = ? ORDER BY Task, Revision, JAVA_CLASS_ERROR\n LIMIT ?

BIRT2010.queryLike: SELECT s.testsuitename AS Task, td.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.testresult TEST_RESULT FROM ndsreport.test t JOIN ndsreport.testsuite s ON s.id = t.testsuite_id JOIN ndsreport.testresult tr ON tr.id = t.testresult_id JOIN ndsreport.testdescription td ON td.id = t.testdescription_id WHERE s.testsuitename LIKE ? AND td.name = ? ORDER BY TASK, TEST_NAME\n LIMIT ?
BIRT2010.queryAccurate: SELECT s.testsuitename AS Task, td.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.testresult TEST_RESULT FROM ndsreport.test t JOIN ndsreport.testsuite s ON s.id = t.testsuite_id JOIN ndsreport.testresult tr ON tr.id = t.testresult_id JOIN ndsreport.testdescription td ON td.id = t.testdescription_id WHERE s.testsuitename = ? AND td.name = ? ORDER BY TASK, TEST_NAME\n LIMIT ?
BIRT2010.queryCheckGeneration: SELECT * FROM ndsreport.testsuite WHERE testsuitename LIKE ? LIMIT ?

BIRT2020.queryLike: SELECT s.name AS Task, t.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.result TEST_RESULT FROM ndsreport_new.tests_results tr JOIN ndsreport_new.suites s ON s.id = tr.suite_id JOIN ndsreport_new.tests t ON t.id = tr.test_id WHERE s.name LIKE ? AND t.name = ? ORDER BY TASK, TEST_NAME\n LIMIT ?
BIRT2020.queryAccurate: SELECT s.name AS Task, t.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.result TEST_RESULT FROM ndsreport_new.tests_results tr JOIN ndsreport_new.suites s ON s.id = tr.suite_id JOIN ndsreport_new.tests t ON t.id = tr.test_id WHERE s.name = ? AND t.name = ? ORDER BY TASK, TEST_NAME\n LIMIT ?
BIRT2020.queryCheckGeneration: SELECT * FROM ndsreport_new.suites WHERE testsuitename LIKE ? LIMIT ?

BIRT_GENERATION_SELECTOR.g2010: SELECT * FROM ndsreport.testsuite WHERE testsuitename LIKE ? LIMIT ?
BIRT_GENERATION_SELECTOR.g2020: SELECT * FROM ndsreport_new.suites WHERE name LIKE ? LIMIT ?
